name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Nebula Games)
description:
"Hide and Seek " is a small procedural game developed for Procjam 2019!

I have made this game as experiment using Phaser 3 JS for the first time. The framework has a lot of potential, but It can still improve a lot, fixing some little issues. 

The game has basic mechanics: 

- You play as Kaku that is playing hide and seek with his sister (Ebi) in the wood. You have to search for her opening a path between trees and inspect them if you think that she's hiding in that spot. 

But can you win all the times? ;)

COMMANDS:

  • Arrows Keys -> Movement; 
  • Key Z -> Cut tree/Confirm;
  • Key X -> Inspect tree;

TIPS:

  • If you cut the three where Ebi's hiding she will run away!
  • If you check too many trees without finding Ebi, she will run away as well.

CREDITS AND SOURCE CODE:

You can find the credits for the stuff used and the source code of the game on my github repository HERE.

Thank you for playing :D
